bug.author: amygeorge
bug.description:
BokehDeprecationWarning: 'legend' keyword is deprecated, use explicit 'legend_label', 'legend_field', or 'legend_group' keywords instead To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Extract a new lexicon Run "Classify" Attempt to click on Bokeh Nothing shows up
Expected behavior See the example sentence or aspect **Environment setup: **
OS (Linux/Mac OS): Linux Ubuntu 18.04 Python version: 3.6 Backend:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15726648/75295121-e421d480-57de-11ea-9f34-6823e8254a7a.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/amygeorge>@amygeorge</denchmark-link> , Thanks for noticing, please try rolling back to bokeh version 1.2.0.
